speaker: DUNCAN
text:
This
               
              castle
               
              hath
               
              a
               
              pleasant
               
              seat
              .
               
              The
               
              air

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
Nimbly
               
              and
               
              sweetly
               
              recommends
               
              itself

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
Unto
               
              our
               
              gentle
               
              senses
              .

speaker: BANQUO
text:
This
               
              guest
               
              of
               
              summer
              ,

speaker: BANQUO
text:
The
               
              temple-haunting
               
              martlet
              ,
               
              does
               
              approve
              ,

speaker: BANQUO
text:
By
               
              his
               
              loved
               
              mansionry
              ,
               
              that
               
              the
               
              heaven’s
               
              breath

speaker: BANQUO
text:
Smells
               
              wooingly
               
              here
              .
               
              No
               
              jutty
              ,
               
              frieze
              ,

speaker: BANQUO
text:
Buttress
              ,
               
              nor
               
              coign
               
              of
               
              vantage
              ,
               
              but
               
              this
               
              bird

speaker: BANQUO
text:
Hath
               
              made
               
              his
               
              pendant
               
              bed
               
              and
               
              procreant
               
              cradle
              .

speaker: BANQUO
text:
Where
               
              they
               
              most
               
              breed
               
              and
               
              haunt
              ,
               
              I
               
              have
               
              observed
              ,

speaker: BANQUO
text:
The
               
              air
               
              is
               
              delicate
              .

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
See
              ,
               
              see
               
              our
               
              honored
               
              hostess
              !
              —

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
The
               
              love
               
              that
               
              follows
               
              us
               
              sometime
               
              is
               
              our
               
              trouble
              ,

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
Which
               
              still
               
              we
               
              thank
               
              as
               
              love
              .
               
              Herein
               
              I
               
              teach
               
              you

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
How
               
              you
               
              shall
               
              bid
               
              God
               
              ’ild
               
              us
               
              for
               
              your
               
              pains

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
And
               
              thank
               
              us
               
              for
               
              your
               
              trouble
              .

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
All
               
              our
               
              service
              ,

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
In
               
              every
               
              point
               
              twice
               
              done
               
              and
               
              then
               
              done
               
              double
              ,

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
Were
               
              poor
               
              and
               
              single
               
              business
               
              to
               
              contend

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
Against
               
              those
               
              honors
               
              deep
               
              and
               
              broad
               
              wherewith

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
Your
               
              Majesty
               
              loads
               
              our
               
              house
              .
               
              For
               
              those
               
              of
               
              old
              ,

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
And
               
              the
               
              late
               
              dignities
               
              heaped
               
              up
               
              to
               
              them
              ,

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
We
               
              rest
               
              your
               
              hermits
              .

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
Where’s
               
              the
               
              Thane
               
              of
               
              Cawdor
              ?

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
We
               
              coursed
               
              him
               
              at
               
              the
               
              heels
               
              and
               
              had
               
              a
               
              purpose

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
To
               
              be
               
              his
               
              purveyor
              ;
               
              but
               
              he
               
              rides
               
              well
              ,

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
And
               
              his
               
              great
               
              love
              ,
               
              sharp
               
              as
               
              his
               
              spur
              ,
               
              hath
               
              helped
               
              him

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
To
               
              his
               
              home
               
              before
               
              us
              .
               
              Fair
               
              and
               
              noble
               
              hostess
              ,

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
We
               
              are
               
              your
               
              guest
               
              tonight
              .

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
Your
               
              servants
               
              ever

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
Have
               
              theirs
              ,
               
              themselves
              ,
               
              and
               
              what
               
              is
               
              theirs
               
              in
               
              compt

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
To
               
              make
               
              their
               
              audit
               
              at
               
              your
               
              Highness’
               
              pleasure
              ,

speaker:
LADY
               
              MACBETH
text:
Still
               
              to
               
              return
               
              your
               
              own
              .

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
Give
               
              me
               
              your
               
              hand
              .

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
Conduct
               
              me
               
              to
               
              mine
               
              host
              .
               
              We
               
              love
               
              him
               
              highly

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
And
               
              shall
               
              continue
               
              our
               
              graces
               
              towards
               
              him
              .

speaker: DUNCAN
text:
By
               
              your
               
              leave
              ,
               
              hostess
              .
